description: Canada on Monday announced more measures in response to Russia's invasion of Ukraine, including additional sanctions and a ban on the export of technologies that could help improve Russia's defense manufacturing capability.
title: Canada to impose additional sanctions, ban tech export to Russia -statement - Reuters Canada

description: Tokyo Olympic medallist Kayla Sanchez will no longer represent Canada in international competition and will seek to compete for the Philippines, Swimming Canada said on Thursday.
title: Canada's Sanchez seeks Philippines switch - Reuters
content:
July 7 (Reuters) - Tokyo Olympic medallist Kayla Sanchez will no longer represent Canada in international competition and will seek to compete for the Philippines, Swimming Canada said on Thursday.
